mapper.select: SELECT ERROR_MSG, SOLUTION_MSG, id, del_yn, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt FROM ZTHH_ERRORHIST where del_yn='N' ORDER BY update_dt, create_dt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZTHH_ERRORHIST (ERROR_MSG, SOLUTION_MSG, id, del_yn, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt) VALUES (#{errorMsg}, #{solutionMsg}, #{id}, 'N', #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updateId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS error_date, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM ZTHH_ERRORHIST WHERE create_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 5 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD')
